summary: Adds a nice retexture to the default daedric armor to give a more evil feel
descriptionHtml:
====Description====
I decided to make this retex because i found that the original armor didnt feel so evil. so i decided to add some highres chains and blood soaked metal to the armour and also chained the glow to a blood colour.

====Install=====
Due to problems with the mesh installation with NMM, you will have to download it manualy and place the meshes and texture files into the Skyrim data folder yourself, otherwise bugs may arrise.
author: Countercruel
